entry.title: 操作系统学习笔记（1）
entry.content:
The memory system

L0 : registers L1 : on-chip L1 cache (SRAM) L2 : off-chip L2 cache (SRAM) L3 : main memory (DRAM) L4 : local secondary storage (local disk) L5 : remote secondary storage (distributed file systems, Web servers)

from top to botton, Larger,slower, and cheaper storage devices register file is a cache for the L1 cache, which is a cache for the L2 cache, which is a cache for the main memory, whici is a cache for the disk.

The Operating System Manages The Hardware

Processes

A process is the operating system’s abstraction for a running program.

entry.title: CF VS NS
entry.content:
参考 http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9353804/cf-objects-vs-ns-objects

1.不是所有的CF类有等价的NS类，反之亦然。
2.有相同名称的类不一定做相同的事。
3.尽量用NS。底层框架不支持NS，或性能要求高的部分用CF。

entry.title: 2013新年许愿
entry.content:
按照惯例每年三个

我的

  1. 收入达到预期
  2. 技术提高
  3. 买新手机，不丢手机

老婆的

  1. 读完100本
  2. 实习顺利
  3. 爸妈跟老公身体健康开开心心的度过一年

entry.title: learning vi note
entry.content:
set foldmethod = indent

zM 全部折叠
zR 全部打开

entry.title: Shell 学习笔记(1)
entry.content:
若一条命令被设置过别名，你又想执行原始版本，则需要在命令前加上反斜杠

例如：
alias ls=”ls -l”
ls /usr/bin 等于 ls -l /usr/bin
\ls /usr/bin 等于 ls /usr/bin

sudo !!

以root的身份执行上一条命令 。

entry.title: IOS学习笔记
entry.content:
@class

告诉编译器有这样一个类，不会引入类的内容，节省时间。
- 1. 需要用到这个类名，但不需要类的成员或方法时尽量用@class，否则需要用#import。
- 2. 两个类相互引用引起死锁时，要使用@class。

entry.title: 英语学习笔记（1）
entry.content:
1. He paid upfront.
  2. I got a new gig.
  3. I’m still on the fence.
  4. I’m on a tight budget.
  5. She’s the breadwinner.
  6. It was Bettle’s rip-off.
  7. My computer crashed.
  8. We had a working lunch.
  9. I felt very out of place.
  10. It was just passing fad.
  11. I have some reservations.(我保留意见)
  12. Actually, I am between jobs. (I’m unemployed.)
  13. We need to meet halfway. (妥协,compromise)
  14. Please keep me informed.
  15. Don’t be such a know-it-all.(自以为无所不知的人)
  16. You are behind on your rent.(behind=late)
  17. His Optimism is contagious.(他的乐观情绪有传染性的)
  18. He maxed out his credit card.(超过信用额度credit line)
  19. The company went belly up.(倒闭)
  20. You are better off not doing it.(更好)

entry.title: hello world again!
entry.content:
把octopress从公司的archlinux迁移到自己的mac时不慎把所有数据丢失了，还好原来的日志不多。

不过在mountain lion上安装octopress时跟着官网提示的步配置环境，总是报错，貌似是xcode版本问题。 后来看了一篇日志后搞定。

日志链接 http:tylermauthe.com/blog/blog/2012/08/08/how-to-setup-octopress-on-mac-osx-mountain-lion/
